page.title: 16PLAYSCHEMES.
page.content: DURING THE 6 WEEKS{SCHOOL HOLIDAYS, {DURHAM COUNTY COUNCIL}ORGANISE PLAYSCHEMES.THESE GET THE LOCAL CHILDREN INVOLVED IN{SPORTS ACTIVITIES TO KEEP THEM OCCUPIED AND "OFF THE STREETS".THE LOCAL{SCHOOLS}IN{FISHBURN AND{TRIMDON}WILL BOTH BE HAVING SCHEMES THIS YEAR,LASTING FROM{22 JULY TO{23 AUGUST.}FOR MOST OF THE TIME THE CHILDREN WILL PLAY LOTS OF DIFFERENT GAMES ORGANISED BY TWO{PLAYLEADERS. THIS WILL TAKE PLACE ON{THE SCHOOL {FIELDS.}THEY WILL ALSO BE ABLE TO GO ON DAY-TRIPS TO THE LOCAL LEISURE CENTRES AT{FERRYHILL}AND{SPENNYMOOR FOR{SWIMMING,SKATING, DISCOS}AND EVEN TO SEE{FILMS.}THERE IS A SMALL CHARGE FOR THESE VISITS BUT THE DAILY GAMES AND SPORTS ARE FREE. THESE SCHEMES HELP TO STOP THE CHILDREN BECOMING BORED IN THE LONG SCHOOL HOLIDAYS AND HELPS TO KEEP THEM SAFE.
